A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A total middle finger to dedicated fans of the original films. The plot was incoherent\, characters that were hyped up from the previous film were killed off for no reason\, the overuse of childish humour\, which makes it seem the film doesnt take itself seriously and of course Leia surviving being blasted into space. Shambles of a film\, and I didnt even go into it with high expectations.
